articles.title: Tennis-Greek Tsitsipas goes down fighting as Argentina, Spain stay unbeaten
articles.description: In Group A, former winners Serbia failed to make their advantage count after clinching the opening singles rubber, going down 2-1 to Chile. Filip Krajinovic put them ahead with a hard-fought 6-4 3-6 7-6(5) win over Alejandro Tabilo but Chile levelled the tie through Cristian Garin, who was leading 4-6 6-4 3-0 against Dusan Lajovic when the Serbian number two was forced to retire with cramps.
articles.content: Stefanos Tsitsipas showed little sign of the elbow problem that forced him out of his ATP Cup singles opener but he failed to find a way past Diego Schwartzman as the Argentine won an epic battle 6-7(5) 6-3 6-3 on Monday to lead his team to a 3-0 win... [3136 chars]

articles.title: Argentina exported record $32.8 bln in grains and derivatives in 2021 - CIARA-CEC
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Jan 3 (Reuters) - Argentina exported $32.8 billion in grains and their derivatives in 2021, a record amount of earnings since the beginning of this century, the country's CIARA-CEC grains exporters and oilseed crushing chamber said in a report released over the weekend.Farm-sector export dollars are a key source of revenue for Argentina as it exits a recession

articles.description: Tsitsipas went under the knife in late November after pulling out of the ATP Finals in Turin, hoping to be at full fitness for the Australian Open later this month

articles.title: Sports News Roundup: DeMar DeRozan lifts Bulls at buzzer again; Humbert stuns Medvedev at ATP Cup, De Minaur beats Berrettini and more
articles.description: Argentina international Messi joined PSG from boyhood club Barcelona in August and the 34-year-old has scored six goals in 16 games in all competitions for the Parisian side. Cricket-England head coach Silverwood tests positive for COVID-19 England head coach Chris Silverwood has tested positive for COVID-19 while isolating in Melbourne, the country's cricket board (ECB) said on Sunday.
articles.content:
Following is a summary of current sports news briefs.

articles.title: Lionel Messi one of four PSG players to test positive for Covid-19
articles.description: The Argentina international will stay in his home country until he tests negative.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi is among four Paris St Germain players who have tested positive for Covid-19 after returning from the winter break.
